file_content.text: Come on, Foursen. Say it just like I taught you.
The Republic lackeys will drown in lakes of fire and blood, master. Death to all who oppose the people's will, master.
That's better, but you need to put more into those words. Say them like you mean them.
Oh. Hello. You're, uh, different from most of us true believers. Er, not that that's a bad thing.
We've been having trouble with the power relays. You, uh, mind if I do some maintenance on the computer core?
Hey there. We've had some trouble with the power relays. I need to check on the computer core. You mind?
That's quite a sidekick you've got there.
Not at all. Nice droid.
You like my buddy Foursen? I've been building him since I was a kid. Started as a pile of scrap--now look at him.
He's got advanced targeting computers and enough firepower to take down a whole Republic squad by himself.
Get out of here, kid. I mean it.
You need to leave.
What's your problem? Hey, who are you? I haven't seen you at the rallies.
Master, I detect the presence of several non-functioning humans. Specifically, the bodies over there. Setting alert status red.
By the stars! Republic troops have invaded our base!
We must be under attack!
Oh, no! Foursen, activate combat protocols! We've got to warn the others!
Master, my sensors detect no evidence of hostile forces.
But that doesn't make sense....
When was the last time you calibrated that droid's sensors?
Your droid's malfunctioning.
Not recently enough to take any chances. We need to put the base on alert and rally the men.
Here, comrade. If you see any Republic lackeys, use this on them.
Let's go, Foursen! There's no time to waste!
Who are you gonna believe? That bucket of bolts, or me?
Never trust a droid.
You're not even human. Why should I trust you?
Foursen's a proud member of the cause. I don't even know you.
Master, I estimate a ninety-nine point nine percent probability this individual is a hostile invader. Initiating defense mode.
I knew there was something weird about this. Foursen, show this scum what you can do!
Enough, already. [Attack]
I thought something smelled funny in here.
Is that what smells?
Master, my sensors indicate this individual's armaments were recently used in combat. Initiating defense mode.
I knew you didn't belong here! Foursen, power up!
You killed those men, didn't you? Foursen, do your thing!
That's too bad. [Attack]
You're in the wrong place at the wrong time, kid.
I sure do. [Attack]
Foursen, open fire!
Combat protocols activated.
Hey, you're not with the glorious revolution!
